first_para: Nia Rhiannon Griffith (born 4 December 1956) is a British Labour Party politician, who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Llanelli since 2005.

full.extract:
Nia Rhiannon Griffith (born 4 December 1956) is a British Labour Party politician, who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Llanelli since 2005.
She is currently Shadow Minister for Wales, deputy to Shadow Secretary of State for Wales, Owen Smith.
^ http://www.parliament.uk/biographies/commons/nia-griffith/37590
full.title: Nia Griffith
